alert.note: Alert for Kenosha; Racine; Walworth (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 10:39PM CDT until April 15 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Walworth County in southeastern Wisconsin... Western Racine County in southeastern Wisconsin... Western Kenosha County in southeastern Wisconsin... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1038 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sharon to near Woodstock, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elkhorn, Delavan, Lake Geneva, East Troy, Williams Bay, Wind Lake, Twin Lakes, Rochester, Wheatland, Genoa City, Walworth, Silver Lake, Fontana-On-Geneva Lake, Powers Lake, Browns Lake, Como, Waterford North, Pell Lake, Potter Lake, and Eagle Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
